meta.job_title: Head of FI and IWMS Data Management

duties_responsibilities.duty: Define and evolve a strategic vision, strategy, and mission for Data Management in the FI and IWMS functions.
Prioritize engineering teams to build new data assets and enable adoption of Enterprise Analytics Platform.
Lead strategic data ownership and vendor management across the business.
Develop and ensure strong data quality practice and governance policies.
Proactively partner with insights and analytics teams to understand and communicate strategic priorities for data-driven decision making.
Support and encourage squad leaders to enhance skills and knowledge in various areas including technical, AI, and business acumen.
Assess industry and client trends and share insights across functions.
Drive collaboration, knowledge sharing, and alignment with other leaders to achieve organizational results.
Collaborate with Chapter Area and Product Area Leaders to develop technology roadmaps and minimize redundancy in IT management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in data management, business intelligence, or related field (Master's preferred)
